body_html:
Is there anything else running on the same XP gpu?

To free up GPU memory, you can try approaches recommended on stackoverflow, for example:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15197286/how-can-i-flush-gpu-memory-using-cuda-physical-reset-is-unavailable

body:
Is there anything else running on the same XP gpu?

To free up GPU memory, you can try approaches recommended on stackoverflow, for example:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15197286/how-can-i-flush-gpu-memory-using-cuda-physical-reset-is-unavailable
